thread.title: It's time for Rutgers to step up against Michigan State
thread.title_full: It's time for Rutgers to step up against Michigan State

author: app.com
title: It's time for Rutgers to step up against Michigan State
text:
MORE PISCATAWAY – It’s time.
There will be no better stage than a Saturday night at High Point Solutions Stadium, with a blackout in the stands and a primetime atmosphere energizing the players.
There can be no better timing with No. 4 Michigan State having barely survived last Saturday, winning 24-21 against a Purdue team that entered as 22-point underdogs.
If Rutgers wants to make a statement, beat the Spartans, or at least scare the daylights out of them this weekend.
Because if they can’t start to erase the stigma of four losses by a 180-44 margin against the Big Ten’s top programs last year, including a 44-3 loss to Michigan State, it will be a clear sign the program’s losing ground to pretty much everyone in the conference.
Teams are stepping up everywhere within the Big Ten, with No. 1 Ohio State needing a late rally to turn back Indiana, 34-27, on Saturday, and Nebraska losing to Illinois.
